mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.member_nickname, m.member_region, m.member_profile_uuid, m.member_profile_original_name, m.member_profile_path, m.member_profile_size, b.board_id, b.board_title, b.board_price, r.reply_id, round(AVG(r.reply_score),0) AS avg_reply_score FROM tbl_reply r INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN tbl_board b ON r.board_id = b.board_id GROUP BY r.board_id order by avg_reply_score desc limit 6;

select m.member_id, m.member_nickname, m.member_profile_uuid, m.member_profile_original_name, m.member_profile_path, m.member_profile_size, b.board_id, b.board_title, bf.board_file_id, bf.board_file_original_name, bf.board_file_uuid, bf.board_file_path, bf.board_file_size, bf.board_file_status from tbl_member m inner join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id left join tbl_board_file bf on b.board_id = bf.board_id where board_file_status = 1 order by b.board_register_date desc limit 8

select m.member_id, m.member_nickname, m.member_profile_uuid, m.member_profile_original_name, m.member_profile_path, m.member_profile_size, b.board_id, b.board_title, b.board_region ,bf.board_file_id, bf.board_file_original_name, bf.board_file_uuid, bf.board_file_path, bf.board_file_size from tbl_member m inner join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id left join tbl_board_file bf on b.board_id = bf.board_id where (b.board_region = #{boardRegion} or #{boardRegion} = 0) and board_file_status = 1 order by b.board_register_date desc limit 8
select board_file_id, board_file_original_name, board_file_uuid, board_file_path, board_file_status, board_file_size, board_id from tbl_board_file where board_file_status = 1 order by rand() limit 8
